mapper.delete: delete from requestpayment where p_code = #{pCode} and rownum=1
mapper.select: select p_code pCode,p_money pMoney,d_mno dMno,f_no fNo,d_email dEmail from requestpayment where p_code=#{pCode} and rownum=1
select * from (select r.* , rownum rnum from (select p_code pCode,p_money pMoney,f_no fNo,d_email dEmail from requestpayment) r where rownum <=#{endRowNum}) where rnum >=#{startRowNum}
